tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spacecraft_maintenance_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_details TEXT,
    maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  spacecraft_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  log_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE system_components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(255),
  component_name VARCHAR(255),
  component_status VARCHAR(50),
  last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_systems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_components (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(255),
  component_type VARCHAR(100),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_personnel (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  contact_info VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  component_id INT,
  maintenance_personnel_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog ( 
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    spacecraft_id INT REFERENCES Spacecraft(spacecraft_id), 
    maintenance_date DATE, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50), 
    technician_id INT REFERENCES TeamMembers(member_id), 
    details TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE PartsInventory ( 
    part_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    part_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    part_description TEXT, 
    quantity INT, 
    location VARCHAR(100) 
);
